meanings.definition: To touch or stroke gently with the hand.
meanings.sent1: She pats her dog on the head.
meanings.sent2: He pats the dust off his clothes.
meanings.sent3: The cat pats at the yarn playfully.
meanings.sent4: The rain pats softly on the window.
meanings.sent5: Grandma pats the dough to make cookies.

meanings.definition: A light, gentle stroke or tap.
meanings.sent1: The puppy enjoys receiving pats from everyone.
meanings.sent2: She felt a comforting pat on her shoulder.
meanings.sent3: The pat on the back boosted his confidence.
meanings.sent4: The gentle pat of the breeze calmed her nerves.
meanings.sent5: A pat on the head can show affection.

meanings.definition: To flatten, smooth, or shape with light taps.
meanings.sent1: She pats the dough to make it even.
meanings.sent2: He pats the sand to create a castle.
meanings.sent3: The baker pats the bread dough gently.
meanings.sent4: The artist pats the clay into a beautiful shape.
meanings.sent5: The gardener pats the soil to plant seeds.
